overview:
Anthea joined NESTA in January 2007 and is leading NESTA’s investment in funds.

Antheaâ€™s background is in corporate finance and venture capital. After several years with Charterhouse, she joined Lloyds Development Capital, where she was a director responsible for completing a large number of leveraged transactions. During this time, she was a non-executive director of 10 companies, covering a wide variety of industry sectors.

She then joined Deutsche Bankâ€™s Emerging Markets Division, looking at investments in Latin America and Eastern Europe before transferring to the Asset Management Division to take responsibility for a portfolio of technology investments.
